mapper.select:
select a.*,u.realname from t_auth_log a, t_user u where a.user_id=u.id
and u.name like concat(#{name},'%')
and u.tenant_id=#{tenantId}
order by u.create_time desc

select a.*,u.realname from t_auth_log a, t_user u where a.user_id=u.id
and u.name like concat(#{name},'%')
and u.tenant_id=#{tenantId}
order by u.create_time desc
